mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.insur_product_id AS "insurProductId", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.enterprise_type AS "enterpriseType", a.business_content AS "businessContent", a.open_address AS "openAddress", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.total_claim AS "totalClaim", a.each_claim AS "eachClaim", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pro_zy_mba( id, insur_product_id, order_id, enterprise_type, business_content, open_address, start_time, end_time, total_claim, each_claim, create_by, create_time, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{insurProductId}, #{orderId}, #{enterpriseType}, #{businessContent}, #{openAddress}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{totalClaim}, #{eachClaim}, #{createBy.name}, #{createTime}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pro_zy_mba SET insur_product_id = #{insurProductId}, order_id = #{orderId}, enterprise_type = #{enterpriseType}, business_content = #{businessContent}, open_address = #{openAddress}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, total_claim = #{totalClaim}, each_claim = #{eachClaim}, create_time = #{createTime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
